name: Rotating Image Right
editableFields: Image: URL where image resides…relative path
Image Link URL: HREF URL to set the link as.  If null then image displays without a hyperlink…also included is _target field
Image Target: Weather you want the link to open in a new window or not
Image Alt Text: : Alt text for the image
description: Displays rotating images with optional links. Images should be 230px wide
